translation.en: [narrator] The Flounders.
translation.zh: 比目鱼队

translation.en: A ragtag team of rejects from the Valley...
translation.zh: 圣费尔南多山谷垃圾们组成的乌合之众

translation.en: assembled for one reason
translation.zh: 因着一个共同的原因

translation.en: and one reason only.
translation.zh: 聚集到了一起

translation.en: -[narrator] To fail. -[thuds]
translation.zh: 为了失败

translation.en: -[spits] -[narrator] But they didn't fail.
translation.zh: 可他们没有失败

translation.en: They didn't exactly succeed,
translation.zh: 他们虽然也没有成功

translation.en: -but they didn't fail. -[Tyler grunts]
translation.zh: 但却没有失败

translation.en: Thanks to a technicality,
translation.zh: 幸亏一个技术问题

translation.en: they passed the Junior Rescue Training.
translation.zh: 他们通过了少年救生员训练

translation.en: Now, they'll be protecting the beaches of Malibu
translation.zh: 现在起 他们会在二号救生塔上

translation.en: from Tower Two.
translation.zh: 看护马里布海滩

translation.en: -[upbeat music playing] -[narrator] Tyler, the wise guy
translation.zh: 泰勒 有着一头秀发的聪明人

translation.en: with the great hair.
translation.zh: 有着一头秀发的聪明人

translation.en: -Gina... -[grunts]
translation.zh: 吉娜

translation.en: ...the tough one.
translation.zh: 最强硬的人

translation.en: Lizzie. Spunky, with a dark side.
translation.zh: 莉齐 勇敢坚定 有着黑暗的一面

translation.en: Dylan, the captain with a lot to prove.
translation.zh: 迪伦 还需要证明自己能力的队长

translation.en: Eric, the heart of the group.
translation.zh: 埃里克 队伍之心

translation.en: And... Tyler--
translation.zh: 还有泰勒

translation.en: -[Gina] Hold on. -[cell phone beeps]
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: -You already said Tyler. -I did?
translation.zh: -你已经说过“泰勒”-说过了？

translation.en: You started with him. It's way too much Tyler.
translation.zh: 你一开头就说的是他太多泰勒了

translation.en: I think it's exactly the right amount of me.
translation.zh: 我倒是觉得我被提到的分量刚好

translation.en: Of course you do.
translation.zh: 你当然这么觉得

translation.en: "Spunky with a dark side"? I don't see it.
translation.zh: “勇敢坚定 有着黑暗的一面” ？不见得吧

translation.en: Oh! Did I tell you?
translation.zh: 我有说过吗？周末我爸赤脚修草坪时

translation.en: My dad was mowing the lawn in his bare feet and he cut off three toes.
translation.zh: 我有说过吗？周末我爸赤脚修草坪时 割了三脚趾我问医生

translation.en: I asked the doctor if I could sew one on and he said maybe next time.
translation.zh: 我能不能缝一个 他说下次吧

translation.en: [giggling] I really hope there's a next time!
translation.zh: 我真心希望 能有下一次

translation.en: Oh. "Spunky with a dark side."
translation.zh: “勇敢坚定 有着黑暗的一面”

translation.en: I hear it now.
translation.zh: 我听懂了

translation.en: Yo, Eric, I can't believe you made this. Where'd you get the footage?
translation.zh: 埃里克 你居然做了这个你哪来的素材？

translation.en: Vooch shot it.
translation.zh: 伍奇拍的

translation.en: I also do weddings and bar mitzvahs.
translation.zh: 我还接婚礼和犹太成人礼的拍摄哟

translation.en: Guys, squeeze in.
translation.zh: 大家挤一挤

translation.en: I wanna get a pic of your first day as official Malibu Junior Rescue.
translation.zh: 你们成为马里布海滩少年救生员的第一天 我想拍个照

translation.en: Everybody say, "Who's driving?"
translation.zh: 大家都说 “谁在开车啊？”

translation.en: [all] Who's driving?
translation.zh: 谁在开车啊？

translation.en: Wait, who is driving?
translation.zh: 等等 谁在开车啊？

translation.en: [Dylan] Where are they?
translation.zh: 他们在哪啊？

translation.en: Please, please, please, don't be late on our first day!
translation.zh: 快快快 可不要第一天就迟到

translation.en: Oh, hey, Dylan! Where's your "team"?
translation.zh: 噢 嘿 迪伦 你的队伍在哪里？

translation.en: You know... I thought I smelled Valley trash earlier,
translation.zh: 你懂的… 就说闻到了山谷垃圾味

translation.en: but it turns out I was just walking by the dumpster.
translation.zh: 不过原来我只是路过了垃圾站

translation.en: [laughing awkwardly] That's funny!
translation.zh: 真是有趣

translation.en: You know, they're on their way. Be here any second.
translation.zh: 你懂的 他们就在路上 随时就到

translation.en: Boop-boop! Oh, just got a text. [giggles]
translation.zh: 噗呼 噢 刚收到信息

translation.en: -They're right around the corner. -Did you just say, "boop-boop"?
translation.zh: 他们就在附近 你刚说了“噗呼”吗？

translation.en: No, that's the sound my phone makes when I get a text. [laughs]
translation.zh: 不 那是我手机收到信息的声音

translation.en: Oh, hang on, I gotta respond.
translation.zh: 噢 等等 我得回一下

translation.en: -Click, click, click, click, click... -Your phone is wack.
translation.zh: 喀嚓 喀嚓 喀嚓 你的手机真烂

translation.en: Just admit it, Dylan. You can't handle being a captain.
translation.zh: 你就承认吧 迪伦 你做不来队长

translation.en: Garvin should have never given you a tower.
translation.zh: 加文就不该分救生塔给你

translation.en: Hey, guys! Ready to save some lives?
translation.zh: 嘿 大家好啊 准备好救人了吗？

translation.en: Oh! Can you say it again? Eric's head was in the way.
translation.zh: 能再说一遍吗？埃里克的头刚挡了镜头

translation.en: Vooch has been filming us for weeks without our knowledge.
translation.zh: 伍奇最近一直在暗中拍我们

translation.en: Oh, that's... troubling.
translation.zh: 噢 那…不太好啊

translation.en: [gasps] All right, all right, I'm coming. I'll be right there.
translation.zh: 好了 我来了 我就到了

translation.en: I'm so proud of you guys. Aw! Kill it today, okay?
translation.zh: 我真为你们骄傲 嗷 杀出血路哦 懂吗？

translation.en: No, wait!
translation.zh: 不 等等

translation.en: Save it.
translation.zh: 换成“救出生天”

translation.en: -["Wedding March" playing] -[bus rattling]
translation.zh: （新婚燕尔）

translation.en: You guys, you're here! You're officially Malibu Junior Rescue!
translation.zh: 大伙儿 你们到了 你们正式成为马里布海滩少年救生员

translation.en: -Yeah! -[chuckles] Yeah! Now what?
translation.zh: 耶！然后呢？

translation.en: [Dylan] Malibu Beach.
translation.zh: 马里布海滩

translation.en: Twenty-seven miles of the most beautiful coast in the world,
translation.zh: 这是世界上最美的43公里海岸

translation.en: and it's our job to protect all of it.
translation.zh: 我们的职责就是保护整个海滩

translation.en: From the beach, from the water, from the air...
translation.zh: 从沙滩 从水里 从空中

translation.en: Not space. That's not really our jurisdiction.
translation.zh: 没有太空 那块不是我们的负责区域

translation.en: [Brody] All right!
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Welcome to the first day of Malibu Beach Junior Rescue! Come on!
translation.zh: 欢迎今天新加入的马里布海滩少年救生员 加油

translation.en: [Brody] Now listen.
translation.zh: 现在听着

translation.en: Our job is about more than just hangin' out at our towers and lookin' pretty.
translation.zh: 我们的工作可不仅仅只有在救生塔闲聊和打扮得漂漂亮亮的

translation.en: But some of us can't help it. Am I right, Tower One?
translation.zh: 但有人就是控制不了对吧 一号塔？

translation.en: -Come on. -[Tower One cheers]
translation.zh: 来嘛

translation.en: Junior Rescue also gets assignments each morning,
translation.zh: 少年救生员每日还会收到任务

translation.en: and I'm the one in charge of handing them out. [laughs]
translation.zh: 而我则负责分配

translation.en: Most are dope. Some are super lame. But they all gotta get done.
translation.zh: 有些任务很酷 有些很烂但你们必须完成任务

translation.en: So get pumped, Tower One, because I gave us ATV Patrol.
translation.zh: 所以振作起来 一号塔因为我们负责全地形车巡逻

translation.en: -Come on! -[Tower One cheers]
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: Everybody else... check the board. Let's go!
translation.zh: 其他人等 自己看板子 走起！

translation.en: I wonder what assignment we got!
translation.zh: 我好奇我们会做什么任务

translation.en: [sighs] This is an official Junior Rescue assignment?
translation.zh: 这居然真的是少年救生员的任务？

translation.en: I thought we were gonna rescue swimmers, scan for sharks, run in slow motion.
translation.zh: 我以为会是救人 看鲨鱼 慢动作奔跑 你懂的 酷的

translation.en: -You know, cool stuff. -And we will.
translation.zh: 慢动作奔跑 你懂的 酷的 我们会的

translation.en: Well, not run in slow motion. Nobody can do that.
translation.zh: 除了慢动作奔跑 谁都不能那样

translation.en: But for right now, we have to focus on the assignment we got,
translation.zh: 但是现在 先做好我们的任务

translation.en: and keeping the beach clean is important.
translation.zh: 保持海滩干净很重要

translation.en: I know it's not exciting or glamorous.
translation.zh: 我知道这不刺激也不风光

translation.en: You guys, I just checked Instagram,
translation.zh: 大伙儿 我刚看了Instagram

translation.en: and Jiffpom was here, like, five minutes ago!
translation.zh: 狗明星Jiffpom五分钟前就在这里

translation.en: Any one of these piles could be his!
translation.zh: 这里可能有一坨屎就是它的

translation.en: Is it just me, or are there a surprising amount of turds on this beach?
translation.zh: 只有我这么觉得吗？还是沙滩上真的好多屎

translation.en: [Brody] Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Didn't want you guys to get bored, so I restocked the beach for you, losers.
translation.zh: 可不想你们太无聊了我给你们补充点狗屎

translation.en: He borrowed three dogs just to mess with us, and we're losers.
translation.zh: 他去借了三条狗就为了惹我们我们却成了失败者

translation.en: [Brody] Yes, I did.
translation.zh: 是的 没错

translation.en: -I'm gonna handle this. -[Dylan] Tyler, stop.
translation.zh: -我来处理这事-泰勒 不要

translation.en: Okay? it's not worth it. Just ignore him.
translation.zh: 好不？这不值得 无视他就好

translation.en: Oh, hey, uh, watch your step, 'cause Tiger here ate a block
translation.zh: 嘿 小心脚下 因为老虎它呢

translation.en: of cheddar earlier, and it is not agreeing with him.
translation.zh: 刚刚吃了一大块芝士现在肠胃有点不舒服

translation.en: Oh, not one bit. All right, have fun.
translation.zh: 哦 不止一点 好咯 好好捡吧

translation.en: -That was some good poopin', you guys! -[dog barks]
translation.zh: 刚刚拉得真尽兴 伙计们

translation.en: [laughs] Yes, it was.
translation.zh: 是啊 确实

translation.en: I hate that guy.
translation.zh: 我讨厌那人

translation.en: [Eric] Hand sanitizer for you, and you...
translation.zh: 消毒洁手液给你 还有你

translation.en: and you, and me.
translation.zh: 还有你 还有我

translation.en: Lizzie, you want in on this?
translation.zh: 莉齐 你想来一点吗？

translation.en: No, thanks, I'm good.
translation.zh: 不 谢了 不用了

translation.en: Usually I think my mom's crazy for packing things like this...
translation.zh: 通常我妈打包上这些东西我只会觉得她疯了

translation.en: but I'm lovin' it right now.
translation.zh: 但现在我爱死她了

translation.en: -Uh, Dylan, can you do my back? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 迪伦 能帮我擦背? 好啊

translation.en: Well, thanks to Brody, now I have to burn these.
translation.zh: 谢谢布罗迪了现在我得把这些烧了

translation.en: -What's his problem? -He's just trying to get to us.
translation.zh: 他有什么毛病吗？ 他只想惹火我们

translation.en: -Well, it's working. -Look, Dylan, you're our tower captain.
translation.zh: 好吧 他成功了 迪伦 你是我们的队长你得做些什么

translation.en: -You have to do something. -I am.
translation.zh: 迪伦 你是我们的队长你得做些什么 我有在做

translation.en: I'm gonna take us back to our tower, and we're gonna forget all about Brody
translation.zh: 我先把大家带回救生塔然后我们把布罗迪给忘掉

translation.en: and focus on saving lives.
translation.zh: 专注于救人上

translation.en: Come on, guys, let's go.
translation.zh: 来吧 伙计们 走吧

translation.en: There's my least favorite tower.
translation.zh: 这是我最不喜欢的塔

translation.en: -Got a couple more jobs for you guys. -But we already did all our assignments.
translation.zh: 给你们准备了更多的活儿 可我们已完成任务了

translation.en: Yeah, I know, but a couple slipped through the cracks,
translation.zh: 我知道 可有些任务没来得及安排

translation.en: and it's up to me to make sure they get done...
translation.zh: 而且我得确保这些任务都完成了

translation.en: by you.
translation.zh: 你们来完成

translation.en: Buoy maintenance?
translation.zh: 浮标维护？

translation.en: Swim fin disinfection?
translation.zh: 游泳脚蹼消毒？

translation.en: It's almost like someone's giving us the worst jobs on purpose.
translation.zh: 就好像有人故意给我们分了最差的活

translation.en: [laughing] Yeah, it is, isn't it?
translation.zh: 是的 对的 不是吗？

translation.en: That's not fair.
translation.zh: 这不公平

translation.en: But, it is hilarious.
translation.zh: 但这很好笑啊

translation.en: [Brody] What can I say?
translation.zh: 我能说什么？

translation.en: When you guys humiliated us in front of the mayor, you started a war.
translation.zh: 你们当着市长面羞辱了我们你们发动了战争

translation.en: You're punishing us because we saved a life?
translation.zh: 我们救人你们来罚我们？

translation.en: Doy! Uh... What did you think was gonna happen?
translation.zh: 对头！ 你们以为会发生什么？

translation.en: I don't know, we'd be praised for our heroism and welcomed among you?
translation.zh: 我不懂 我以为会因为英勇被表扬被你们欢迎

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, joke's on you, brah.
translation.zh: 出洋相了吧 兄弟

translation.en: You'll never be one of us.
translation.zh: 你们绝不会成为我们一员

translation.en: We all agree we gotta take that guy down, right?
translation.zh: 都同意要把他拉下台 对吧？

translation.en: No, we all agree that no matter what Brody throws at us,
translation.zh: 不 应该是不管布罗迪怎么虐我们

translation.en: we're gonna do such a great job that even he'll have to admit we belong here.
translation.zh: 我们都要好好干做到连他都必须承认我们属于这里

translation.en: [sighs] I can't believe I'm saying this right now, but... Dylan's right.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信我要这么说了可是迪伦说得对

translation.en: We want people to respect us, we have to earn it.
translation.zh: 我们想要人们的尊敬我们要努力

translation.en: Yes, exactly! Take the high road.
translation.zh: 是的 正是如此 我们堂堂正正

translation.en: Come on, team. Let's go scrape barnacles off the buoys.
translation.zh: 来吧小队让我们清理掉浮标上的藤壶吧

translation.en: Taking the high road sucks.
translation.zh: 堂堂正正真的太烂了

translation.en: We earned our spot here, and you're gonna let him ruin our summer?
translation.zh: 我们好不容易到这里来你却让他毁了我们的夏天？

translation.en: Forget that. We gotta fight fire with fire.
translation.zh: 算了吧 我们得以毒攻毒

translation.en: [Dylan] What does that even mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: It means we gotta prank Brody so hard that he'll never mess with us again.
translation.zh: 意思就是我们要耍得布罗迪以后再也不敢惹我们

translation.en: Tyler, everybody already thinks we don't deserve to be here!
translation.zh: 泰勒 大家都已经觉得我们不配在这里了

translation.en: If we go after Brody instead of doing our job, it'll just prove them right.
translation.zh: 如果我们去搞布罗迪却不干活只会证明他们是对的

translation.en: I'm your captain, and I say we scrape buoys.
translation.zh: 我是你的队长我的命令是清理浮标

translation.en: And I will, as soon as I'm done shutting Brody up. Trust me.
translation.zh: 我会去清的 等我整完布罗迪 信我

translation.en: Tyler! [sighs]
translation.zh: 泰勒！

translation.en: I can't believe him! Can you believe him?
translation.zh: 我不能信他居然这么做！你信吗？

translation.en: Actually, I gotta go with Tyler on this one.
translation.zh: 其实 这次我同意泰勒的做法

translation.en: I mean, it's classic first day of kindergarten.
translation.zh: 这就像是上幼儿园的第一天

translation.en: Find the biggest kid on the yard... and take her to knuckle town.
translation.zh: 找到院子里最大个的小孩 然后把他打倒

translation.en: [knuckles crack] Then everybody knows you're no one's punk.
translation.zh: 大家就知道你不是小喽喽

translation.en: Sorry, Dylan!
translation.zh: 抱歉 迪伦

translation.en: This is crazy!
translation.zh: 这也太疯狂了

translation.en: Pretty much.
translation.zh: 差不多了

translation.en: Right, there's gotta be something in here I can use to prank Brody.
translation.zh: 好了 这里总有些东西我能拿来整蛊布罗迪

translation.en: Ooh, hello.
translation.zh: 噢 你好啊

translation.en: Speargun.
translation.zh: 鱼枪

translation.en: -This will totally shut him up. -[fires]
translation.zh: 这个绝对能让他闭嘴

translation.en: Uh, maybe something less permanent.
translation.zh: 也许选个不会造成永久性伤害的

translation.en: -[grunts, groans] -[equipment jangles]
translation.zh: （钓鱼工具）

translation.en: Tyler? Tyler, are you in here?
translation.zh: 泰勒？ 泰勒 你在里面吗？

translation.en: [Tyler, grunting] Over... here.
translation.zh: 在…这边

translation.en: I wanna help get back at Brody.
translation.zh: 我想帮忙整蛊布罗迪

translation.en: Whoa!
translation.zh: 哇噢

translation.en: Is it bad?
translation.zh: 很严重吗？

translation.en: [chuckles softly] It's horrible.
translation.zh: 严重极了

translation.en: Then why are you smiling?
translation.zh: 那你在笑什么？

translation.en: 'Cause I get to take 'em out.
translation.zh: 因为我能把那取出来

translation.en: No, no, no. No, no, no, no. I'm good.
translation.zh: 不不不 我好着呢

translation.en: I'm good. I'm good. [screams]
translation.zh: 我好着呢 我好着呢

translation.en: [Dylan] Hey. We went ahead and grouped the buoys into piles.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们先开始了 把浮标都分堆了

translation.en: That's yours, that's Tyler's, that's Lizzie's.
translation.zh: 那是你的 那是泰勒的 那是莉齐的

translation.en: -Where are those guys? -[Dylan] They promised me
translation.zh: 他们去哪儿了？ 他们答应我的

translation.en: they'd be right back
translation.zh: 他们一做完那件我叫他们不要做的事之后

translation.en: as soon as they finished doing the thing I told them not to do.
translation.zh: 他们一做完那件我叫他们不要做的事之后 就会回来的

translation.en: So you just let them go?
translation.zh: 你就让他们走了？

translation.en: No, I didn't let them. They just... didn't listen.
translation.zh: 不 我没有 他们直接… 不听我的

translation.en: Hey, that's not right. We're a team.
translation.zh: 嘿 那不对 我们是一支队伍啊

translation.en: We can't accomplish anything unless we're together.
translation.zh: 我们不同心协力 只会一事无成

translation.en: -I'll go get them. -No, wait!
translation.zh: 我去找他们 不 等等

translation.en: Seriously?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: We can't be a team if everyone keeps leaving.
translation.zh: 如果人一直走掉 我们可成不了队

translation.en: -Why is nobody listening to me? -[Gina] Don't beat yourself up.
translation.zh: 为什么就没人听我讲？ 别对自己太狠了

translation.en: It's not your fault the team doesn't respect you.
translation.zh: 队员不尊重你不是你的错

translation.en: What, you think the team doesn't respect me?
translation.zh: 啥 你觉得队员们不尊重我？

translation.en: -You think they do? -I did.
translation.zh: -你觉得他们尊重你？-觉得啊

translation.en: Oh...
translation.zh: 噢…

translation.en: Well, they don't.
translation.zh: 好吧 他们不尊重你

translation.en: I ran out of bandages, so I had to get creative.
translation.zh: 我没纱布了 只能发挥创意了

translation.en: Thanks, Lizzie.
translation.zh: 谢啦 莉齐

translation.en: Uh, missed one. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 漏了一个

translation.en: [exhales] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Let's just get the supplies to prank Brody.
translation.zh: 让我们拿上装备 整蛊布罗迪

translation.en: Ooh, grab that rope.
translation.zh: 噢 拿上那捆绳子

translation.en: I have an idea.
translation.zh: 我有个主意

translation.en: Somebody's coming. We're not supposed to be in here. Hide!
translation.zh: 有人来了 我们不该在这里 躲起来！

translation.en: [sighs] Hi, Eric.
translation.zh: 嗨 埃里克

translation.en: [screams] They're alive?
translation.zh: 活的

translation.en: I'm sorry about the mouth-to-mouth. I'd never done it before!
translation.zh: 人工呼吸抱歉了 我之前没做过

translation.en: I didn't know you weren't supposed to use tongue!
translation.zh: 我不知道不该用上舌头的

translation.en: Eric... it's me.
translation.zh: 埃里克 是我啦

translation.en: [chuckles sheepishly] I knew that.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: You guys, Dylan, Gina, and I have been doing all the work.
translation.zh: 你们啊迪伦 吉娜和我把活都干了

translation.en: You gotta come help.
translation.zh: 你们得来帮忙

translation.en: We are helping. We're getting Brody to back off.
translation.zh: 我们是在帮忙 我们会让布罗迪住手

translation.en: But Dylan said--
translation.zh: 但迪伦说了…

translation.en: Dylan wants us to do this.
translation.zh: 迪伦想我们这么做的

translation.en: Then why did she tell you not to?
translation.zh: 那为什么她对你们说不？

translation.en: Think about it. She's the captain. She can't tell us to break the rules.
translation.zh: 你想想 她可是队长 她不能叫我们去破坏规则

translation.en: But she doesn't like Brody any more than we do.
translation.zh: 她也不比我们更喜欢布罗迪

translation.en: -I don't know... -[Tyler] Well, I do!
translation.zh: 我不知道… 好吧 我知道！

translation.en: -Tyler? Where are you? -[Tyler] Let's just say
translation.zh: 泰勒？你在哪里？

translation.en: I didn't jump into a bin full of fish hooks...
translation.zh: 这么说吧 我没跳进装满了鱼钩的桶

translation.en: [groaning] ...and I definitely didn't do it twice.
translation.zh: 我更没有连跳两次

translation.en: [whispers] Yes, he did.
translation.zh: 好吧 他有

translation.en: Then, how am I supposed to get everyone to respect me as the captain?
translation.zh: 那我该怎么做才能让大家都把我当队长看？

translation.en: First, stop asking questions like that. Captains don't ask.
translation.zh: 首先 别再那样问问题队长不发问

translation.en: Okay, let's say you were captain. How would you--
translation.zh: 好吧 就比方说你是队长你会怎么…

translation.en: You're asking again.
translation.zh: 你又在发问了

translation.en: [scoffs] When was the last time anybody cleaned these things?
translation.zh: 这些东西是多久没清洁了？

translation.en: Half my team has bailed on me, Brody thinks I'm a joke...
translation.zh: 我一半的队员都放弃了我 布罗迪觉得我是个笑话

translation.en: Maybe I'm not cut out for this.
translation.zh: 也许我真的不适合

translation.en: Gross.
translation.zh: 恶心

translation.en: You're right. Doubting yourself is gross!
translation.zh: 你说得对 质疑自我太恶心了

translation.en: [sighs] But how can I not?
translation.zh: 可我怎能不质疑自己？

translation.en: I mean, I've been here three summers. I know Junior Rescue inside and out.
translation.zh: 我都连着三年夏天在这儿了我对少年救生队熟得不行

translation.en: I even made captain. Everyone still walks all over me.
translation.zh: 我做了队长 然而大家还是不尊重我

translation.en: You better figure it out fast, 'cause we're the only ones working,
translation.zh: 你最好想快点我们可是唯一在干活的了

translation.en: and these fins are disgusting.
translation.zh: 而且这些脚蹼太恶心了

translation.en: -[ominous cello music playing] -Ew! What is that? Eel barf?
translation.zh: 那是什么？鳗鱼呕吐物吗？

translation.en: -[creature snarls] -[gasps] Something in here just moved!
translation.zh: 里面有东西刚刚动了

translation.en: What is that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: Wait. Those look like tentacles.
translation.zh: 等等 那些像是触手

translation.en: -[ominous music grows louder] -Is that what I think it is?
translation.zh: 这是我认为的那玩意吗？

translation.en: -Whoa. -[both panting]
translation.zh: 哇噢

translation.en: You guys know you got stuff all over your face, right? [snickers]
translation.zh: 你们知道自己脸上全是东西 对吧？

translation.en: That's it! I'm not doing this all summer! I'm taking him down.
translation.zh: 够了 我不要就这么过一夏天 我打倒他

translation.en: Gina, wait!
translation.zh: 吉娜 等等！

translation.en: When Brody comes back to Tower One, he'll step into this net.
translation.zh: 等布罗迪回到一号塔他会踏进这网

translation.en: Which is attached to that parasail.
translation.zh: 这网连着那滑翔伞

translation.en: All of which is attached to that Polaris.
translation.zh: 所有东西连着那越野车

translation.en: I'll drive off, dragging Brody across Dog Beach,
translation.zh: 我会开车拖布罗迪跨狗狗海滩

translation.en: the parasail will open, lifting him into the air and out over the ocean.
translation.zh: 滑翔伞会打开 把他带着上天带到海面上

translation.en: Then we'll release the rope, and kersploosh!
translation.zh: 然后我们把绳子松了 啪嚓掉水了

translation.en: You can say "kersploosh, kersplat, kersplunk." It's still a ker-felony!
translation.zh: 你不能说“啪咔 啪咵 啪呵”那可还是啪罪

translation.en: This is crazy!
translation.zh: 这也太疯狂了

translation.en: Is it crazy or is it crazy?
translation.zh: 这很疯狂吗还是这很疯狂呢？

translation.en: I'm not hearing the difference.
translation.zh: 我没听出有什么差别

translation.en: -Eric, we're doing this for the team. -What team?
translation.zh: -埃里克 我们是为了队伍-什么队？

translation.en: Ever since you decided to prank Brody, we haven't been a team.
translation.zh: 自从你决定整蛊布罗迪我们就不再是队伍了

translation.en: Somebody had to do something. Dylan didn't have a plan.
translation.zh: 总得有人做事迪伦都没有方案

translation.en: Yes, she did. You just didn't give it a chance.
translation.zh: 不 她有 你只是连机会都不给她

translation.en: You ignored her.
translation.zh: 你无视她

translation.en: I didn't mean to.
translation.zh: 我不是故意的

translation.en: Well, you did.
translation.zh: 可你就是无视她了

translation.en: It's our first day, and we're already falling apart.
translation.zh: 我们才来第一天就分崩离析了

translation.en: Don't you get it?
translation.zh: 你还不懂吗？

translation.en: This is exactly what Brody wants.
translation.zh: 这就是布罗迪想要的

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: Are you serious? We're bailing?
translation.zh: 你是认真的吗？要放弃吗？

translation.en: Yeah. We should be helping our team.
translation.zh: 是的 我们得帮自己的队

translation.en: I'll take the Polaris back. Follow me, and you guys untie the net.
translation.zh: 我开走越野车 跟我把网解了

translation.en: There. Fine. Take it apart.
translation.zh: 好咯 行啦 解掉吧

translation.en: I wanna help you take down Brody.
translation.zh: 我想帮你们打倒布罗迪

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no! I just talked them out of it.
translation.zh: 不不不 我才把他们劝回来

translation.en: "Cleaning the outhouses."
translation.zh: “清理户外厕所”

translation.en: Sounds like a Tower Two job to me.
translation.zh: 听起来就是二号塔的活儿

translation.en: What the...
translation.zh: 什么鬼…

translation.en: Help me!
translation.zh: 救我！

translation.en: [yells] There's dog poo in my hair!
translation.zh: 我的头发里有狗屎！

translation.en: [sobbing] Things like this don't happen to Brody!
translation.zh: 这些事不该发生在布罗迪身上！

translation.en: -Whoa! -[Brody] Help me!
translation.zh: -哇噢！-救我！

translation.en: Yes, it worked!
translation.zh: 好棒 成功了

translation.en: Uh, which is very bad.
translation.zh: 哦 那太糟糕了

translation.en: Wait! No, Tyler! We didn't untie the net!
translation.zh: 等等！不 泰勒！我们没有解网！

translation.en: [Brody] Help!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: What's going on? [screaming]
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Help me!
translation.zh: 救我！

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: 噢 不

translation.en: [Brody] Oh, I can see my tower from up here.
translation.zh: 哦 我能从这里看到我的救生塔

translation.en: [Brody] Ow, my boat key.
translation.zh: 哦 我的船钥匙

translation.en: [gasps] What did you guys do?
translation.zh: 你们做了什么？

translation.en: Nothing! I thought we agreed we weren't gonna pull the prank.
translation.zh: 没有！我以为我们都同意收手的

translation.en: Why'd you make it so dangerous?
translation.zh: 你为啥搞那么危险？

translation.en: -That's what I said. -It was Lizzie's idea.
translation.zh: -我说过了-是莉齐的主意

translation.en: -Which worked beautifully, by the way. -[Dylan] Enough!
translation.zh: -顺道一提进行得可顺利了-够了！

translation.en: You guys have been ignoring me all day, and that ends now!
translation.zh: 你们无视了我一整天 这到此结束

translation.en: I'm the captain.
translation.zh: 我是队长 你们听我的命令

translation.en: You're gonna do what I say, how I say it, when I say it.
translation.zh: 只要我说了不管我怎么说 什么时候说的

translation.en: -You got a problem with that? -No.
translation.zh: 你们有问题吗？ 没有

translation.en: No what?
translation.zh: 没有什么？

translation.en: No, Captain!
translation.zh: 没有 队长

translation.en: Tyler, Gina, we need something in case he falls.
translation.zh: 泰勒 吉娜我们得做点什么以防他坠落

translation.en: Lizzie, Eric, grab some rappelling gear and meet me at the Polaris.
translation.zh: 莉齐 埃里克 拿上速降装备跟我在越野车集合

translation.en: [Dylan] Come on, guys, let's go!
translation.zh: 好了 我们上吧

translation.en: Once I hook the net, pull him up with the winch.
translation.zh: 把网钩住 用绞盘拖他

translation.en: [Brody] Why is this happening? Help me! Help me!
translation.zh: 为什么会发生这事？ 救我！救我！

translation.en: Help!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Ow!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: Brody, calm down, we're gonna save you.
translation.zh: 布罗迪 冷静 我们会救你的

translation.en: You're running this rescue? Oh, great. I'm dead.
translation.zh: 你在主持这次救援？ 好了 我死定了

translation.en: -[groans] -Will you stop? I got this.
translation.zh: 你能不能停下来？我能行

translation.en: [shouting] Please! Someone!
translation.zh: 求求了！来人啊！

translation.en: Anybody else!
translation.zh: 任何人！

translation.en: [crying] Tower Two is the worst!
translation.zh: 二号塔最差劲了！

translation.en: [yells] What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: You're gonna leave us alone for the rest of the summer.
translation.zh: 你要在接下来这个夏天放过我们

translation.en: No, I'm not!
translation.zh: 不 我才不

translation.en: Whoa! Wait, wait, what are you doing? Are you crazy?
translation.zh: 等等 你在干嘛？ 你疯了吗？

translation.en: -Stop it! -I will.
translation.zh: -停下来-我会停的

translation.en: If you stop giving us bad assignments. It has to be fair from now on.
translation.zh: 只要你不再给我们分差活儿 从今往后必须公平

translation.en: But I want to ruin your summer.
translation.zh: 可我想毁了你们的夏天

translation.en: -[Dylan grunts] -[Brody] Okay, fine, fine!
translation.zh: 好吧 也行

translation.en: Fine! I'll stop, I'll stop. Just please...
translation.zh: 我答应

translation.en: Please get me out of here. [groans]
translation.zh: 请把我救出去

translation.en: -[screams] -Get ready to pull him up!
translation.zh: 准备好拉他上去！

translation.en: Never mind!
translation.zh: 没事了！

translation.en: [panting] I can't believe... we blew that up... by mouth.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信我们吹好那个… 用的嘴

translation.en: -Why isn't there a pump for this thing? -[panting] There is.
translation.zh: 为什么那玩意没有气泵？ 有的

translation.en: -[Brody grunting] -We just don't have... an extension cord.
translation.zh: 我们只是没有…延长线

translation.en: [shouting] She cut the rope! She's insane!
translation.zh: 她割了绳子！ 她疯了！

translation.en: She cut the rope!
translation.zh: 她割了绳子！

translation.en: Who does that?
translation.zh: 谁会那么做？

translation.en: -[whistle jangles] -Ow! I fell on my whistle.
translation.zh: 我掉到自己哨子上了

translation.en: Yo, Dylan, I can't believe you dropped him. That was hardcore.
translation.zh: 迪伦 你居然让他掉下来那也太狠了

translation.en: You are crazy.
translation.zh: 你疯了

translation.en: No, she's crazy.
translation.zh: 不 她疯了

translation.en: Still don't hear it.
translation.zh: 还是没听懂

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: That was a surprisingly baller move.
translation.zh: 那出乎意料挺酷炫的

translation.en: Well, I'm a surprisingly baller lady. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我就是出乎意料的酷炫女士

translation.en: Don't worry. I won't tell them it was an accident.
translation.zh: 别担心 我不会告诉别人那是意外

translation.en: Thanks. They're totally worshiping me right now.
translation.zh: 谢谢 他们现在彻头彻尾崇拜我了

translation.en: Hey, Dylan.
translation.zh: 嘿 迪伦

translation.en: You're right. You're our captain, and maybe...
translation.zh: 你说得对 你是我们的队长 也许…

translation.en: there's kind of a possibility that... I should have listened to you today.
translation.zh: 可能… 我今天应该听你的

translation.en: Is there anything you wanna say to me?
translation.zh: 你有什么想跟我说吗？

translation.en: I agree. You should've listened to me.
translation.zh: 我同意你 你应该听我的

translation.en: Come on, let's finish our assignments.
translation.zh: 好了 我们来完成任务吧

translation.en: Uh, I'm not going near those swim fins. An octopus peed on me today.
translation.zh: 我不要再靠近那些脚蹼了有只章鱼尿我身上了

translation.en: Please tell me you washed your hands.
translation.zh: 求求你跟我说你洗手了

translation.en: I did not.
translation.zh: 我没洗

translation.en: Hope you don't mind. I gotta make a quick stop
translation.zh: 希望别介意 我得停一下

translation.en: at Adam Schwartzman's bar mitzvah before I take you guys home.
translation.zh: 去了亚当施瓦兹曼的成人礼才能送你们回去

translation.en: I'm Adam.
translation.zh: 我是亚当

translation.en: Today I became a man.
translation.zh: 今天我成人了

translation.en: Put that arm around me, and you won't be one for long.
translation.zh: 敢搭我肩膀就做不了太久男人了

translation.en: [Vooch] Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿 伙计们

translation.en: Does anyone know where we're going? I'm not lost.
translation.zh: 有人知道这是去哪儿吗？ 我没有迷路

translation.en: -But I might be. -[engine sputtering]
translation.zh: 但我有可能迷路

translation.en: ♪ I was gonna be that one in a million ♪
translation.zh: 字幕翻译：Zeo Niu
